reviewText: Couldn't say what I think, as this was a gift purchase for my grandson. He did like them very much, though!

I gave this to my brother-in-law for Christmas along with "Wild Hogs".  He wanted any motorcycle movies and this was a cheap add-on to his gift.  When I gave it to him, he kind of looked strangely and made a comment like, "I guess this is how not to ride a motorcycle."  He didn't seem to like it.  However, we were at his house for a family get-to-gather and guess what the guys were watching all day?  He had all the parts memorized showing them to everyone!
This was a waste of money, it sucks and would not recommend this video to anyone you will be very disappointed

My review is for Got Sand? Extreme ATV-Sandstorm 2-4-1 DVD which looks similar to the dvd in the photo. Pretty cool action of ATV's , Dunebuggys, ATC(3 WHEELERS) little bargain dvd that I got at 7-11. This is a Full throttle Video.
